author: Special Correspondent
text:
Staff of enforcement and territorial wings of the Commercial Taxes Department here are on a protest by going on casual leave, seeking sorting out of issues related to fixing of State-wise seniority.

According to sources in the department, the strength in the two wings in Coimbatore division is 850 and almost 75 per cent of the staff and officials went on casual leave on Tuesday.

According to a press release from the Joint Action Committee of Commercial Taxes Associations, this is part of the State-wide protest.

The State-level committee had a meeting in Madurai on January 9 and it was decided to go on a two-day protest to draw the attention of the Chief Minister to their demands. The protest will continue on Wednesday.
title: Taxes department staff go on mass leave
